body.p:
Dixon Ky Decr 5th 1863
Thomas E Bramlett
Governor of Kentucky
Dr Sir

My business engagements being of such a character as to occupy my entire time. I would respectfully tender your Excellency my resignation of the office of Justice the peace for District No 5 Webster County Ky. and would recommend the appointment of E W Blackburn to fill the vacancy thus occassioned

Webster Co
J P.
Resigned
Accepted
13th Dec/63
Dcr 12th 1863
Accepted
T E Bramlette
